message.content:
read this quip doc using the bulder-mcp 
https://quip-amazon.com/oWrSAsybeqQD/Golden-Path-Ironhide-Migrations

content.text: I'll read the Quip document about Golden Path Ironhide Migrations for you.

{"type":"json","status":"success","content":"# Golden Path Ironhide Migrations
* Setup Autoscaling for Fargate Services - Need someone to pick this up
 * [Code][1]
 * Basically a copy paste of this change, updates autoscaling to scale based on CPU utilization
* Migrate to pipeline update target
 * [Code][2]
 * Ben needs to follow up on it
 * Lowest Priority  
https://docs.hub.amazon.dev/pipelines/cdk-guide/howto-pipelineupdate-migrate/
* move superstar constructs to npmpm from a direct brazil import - DONE
 * [Code][3]
 * Dependency change, looks like we can get lots of targets easily, seems similar to the BrazilPytest migration in it only modifies package.json
 * Migration name: superstar_npmpm
* Add an alarm on traffic intensity coral metric
 * [Code][4]
 * Maybe lower priority
* Enable container insights - In Progress (Anas)
 * [https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/67fc7370e6259624a5414dc196d6745f7af2f4d2#][5]
 * only should target pipelines in SDO
 * Ben can provide targets
* enable coral dense collection - In Progress (Anas)
 * [https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOModel/commits/1fec4e9b596051df037fe36f44562586bdf6a047#][6]
 * one line change
 * Migration name: SmithyDenseCollectionMigration
* add randomization to long stream names from logging sidecar - Need someone to pick this up
 * [https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOLogImageBuild/commits/0142a998c682850e938d198a7086791dcf0ac07a#][7]
 * lots of coes for log streams that got combined with others, adds random strings to prevent collisions
* Hydra auto bootstrap
 * [https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/d3d9d7a2de6534f276c8f6392b8cfed3c223f5c4#][8]
 * Requires enabling a trusted account, which ironhide can’t do on its own
 * requires email or something, should be lower priority
* Migration onto a unified SDO CDK library - DONE
 * [https://code.amazon.com/packages/DainstTestFargateServiceCDK/commits/3c960c05f97f3f94fa63aefce9d6b021ab425498#][9]
 * deterministic import replacement in the package.json, very easy
 * high importance
 * Anas created this
 * Migration name: start-cdk-lib migration
* Zonal Shift - @chazho is working on this one - DONE
 * Chang is working on this one
 * Migration name: ARCZonalShiftEnabling
​
Top Priorities
* Zonal Shift - @chazho - Done
* Migration onto a unified SDO CDK library - @anastark
* Setup Autoscaling for Fargate Services - @anastark
* move superstar constructs to npmpm from a direct brazil import - Done
* Enable container insights - @anastark - In progress
[1]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/9edc27c069ffd22de1cc9962baf1428cbbc593bf#
[2]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/5273b31d3cd3c84e32b1face0f239cfc08c64c50#
[3]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/c6d92a7324a0e91bcbd869555e446857d49ae483#
[4]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/18c24cb28e8693dead6e7cef1aeb17fc94978fd0#
[5]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/67fc7370e6259624a5414dc196d6745f7af2f4d2
[6]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOModel/commits/1fec4e9b596051df037fe36f44562586bdf6a047
[7]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOLogImageBuild/commits/0142a998c682850e938d198a7086791dcf0ac07a
[8]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/d3d9d7a2de6534f276c8f6392b8cfed3c223f5c4
[9]: https://code.amazon.com/packages/DainstTestFargateServiceCDK/commits/3c960c05f97f3f94fa63aefce9d6b021ab425498"}

content.text:
The document outlines Golden Path Ironhide Migrations for Coral Fargate services. Here's a summary of the key migrations:

## Completed:
- **Zonal Shift** - Completed by chazho (Migration: ARCZonalShiftEnabling)
- **Unified SDO CDK library migration** - Completed by anastark (Migration: start-cdk-lib)
- **Superstar constructs to npmpm** - Completed (Migration: superstar_npmpm)

## In Progress:
- **Enable container insights** - Anas working on it (targets SDO pipelines)
- **Enable coral dense collection** - Anas working on it (Migration: SmithyDenseCollectionMigration)

## Need someone to pick up:
- **Setup Autoscaling for Fargate Services** - CPU utilization-based scaling
- **Add randomization to long stream names** - Prevents log stream collisions

## Lower Priority:
- **Migrate to pipeline update target** - Ben following up
- **Add alarm on traffic intensity coral metric**
- **Hydra auto bootstrap** - Requires trusted account setup

The migrations involve updates to various packages including CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK, CoralFargateServiceSDOModel, and CoralFargateServiceSDOLogImageBuild, with code changes linked in the document.

message.content: With this context i want you to make a file here called gp_migrations.md. in that file there will be a markdown styled table. The Columns of that table will be the name of the transform, the link to the code, a place for comments, and then a status. there should be a row for each migration

content.text: I'll create a markdown file with a table containing all the Golden Path Ironhide Migrations from the Quip document.

input.content:
# Golden Path Ironhide Migrations

| Migration Name | Code Link | Comments | Status |
|---|---|---|---|
| Setup Autoscaling for Fargate Services | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/9edc27c069ffd22de1cc9962baf1428cbbc593bf#) | Updates autoscaling to scale based on CPU utilization | Need someone to pick up |
| Migrate to pipeline update target | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/5273b31d3cd3c84e32b1face0f239cfc08c64c50#) | Ben needs to follow up on it. Lowest Priority. [Migration Guide](https://docs.hub.amazon.dev/pipelines/cdk-guide/howto-pipelineupdate-migrate/) | Pending |
| superstar_npmpm | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/c6d92a7324a0e91bcbd869555e446857d49ae483#) | Move superstar constructs to npmpm from direct brazil import. Dependency change, only modifies package.json | DONE |
| Add alarm on traffic intensity coral metric | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/18c24cb28e8693dead6e7cef1aeb17fc94978fd0#) | Maybe lower priority | Pending |
| Enable container insights | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/67fc7370e6259624a5414dc196d6745f7af2f4d2#) | Only should target pipelines in SDO. Ben can provide targets | In Progress (Anas) |
| SmithyDenseCollectionMigration | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOModel/commits/1fec4e9b596051df037fe36f44562586bdf6a047#) | Enable coral dense collection. One line change | In Progress (Anas) |
| Add randomization to long stream names | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOLogImageBuild/commits/0142a998c682850e938d198a7086791dcf0ac07a#) | Lots of COEs for log streams that got combined with others, adds random strings to prevent collisions | Need someone to pick up |
| Hydra auto bootstrap | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/CoralFargateServiceSDOCDK/commits/d3d9d7a2de6534f276c8f6392b8cfed3c223f5c4#) | Requires enabling a trusted account, which ironhide can't do on its own. Requires email or something, should be lower priority | Pending |
| start-cdk-lib migration | [Code](https://code.amazon.com/packages/DainstTestFargateServiceCDK/commits/3c960c05f97f3f94fa63aefce9d6b021ab425498#) | Migration onto a unified SDO CDK library. Deterministic import replacement in package.json, very easy. High importance. Anas created this | DONE |
| ARCZonalShiftEnabling | N/A | Zonal Shift migration. Chang (@chazho) working on this | DONE |
